subject: p13473781
Findings: Single AP upright image of the chest was obtained. There is a left basilar opacity. No right sided pleural effusion. No pulmonary edema. Unchanged markedly dilated cardiac silhouette. No pneumothorax. No bony abnormality. No free air below the hemidiaphragm.
Impression: Left basilar opacity possibly due to pneumonia, effusion, atelectasis or a combination of the above. Stable severe cardiomegaly.
